name: SharpEvtMute EvtMuteHook Load
description: Detects the load of EvtMuteHook.dll, a key component of SharpEvtHook, a tool to tamper with Windows event logs
false_positives: Other DLLs with that import hash
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(related.hash:*IMPHASH\=330768A4F172E10ACB6287B87289D83B* OR file.hash.imphash:330768a4f172e10acb6287b87289d83b)`
